items.title: Scammers Are Creating Fake News Videos to Blackmail Victims
items.description: “Yahoo Boy” scammers are impersonating CNN and other news organizations to create videos that pressure victims into making blackmail payments.

items.title: Here It Is, the Worst Slack Bug
items.description: A glitch in Slack makes it possible to accidentally send your entire DM history with one person to other coworkers. Ask me how I know.
